extension.description:
Kurdistan Livestreams
http://karwan.tv
for this addon you need to register under http://reg.iptvxtra.net/register_kd.php
Multiple registrations are not allowed and will be rewarded with an immediate lock The offer, sell and apply for example, Auction portals is prohibited and will be reported immediately to the operator, on Ebay can draw an immediate exclusion for itself.
Please keep in mind you
